<!-- PR template focused on documentation expectations for this repository -->

## Summary

Short description of changes.

## Checklist (code changes)
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Linting passes
- [ ] Build passes

## Documentation checklist (required for changes that affect entrypoints, workflows, data IO, or config)
- [ ] Added/updated workflow docs in `docs/workflows/` (use `WF-<slug>.md` template)
- [ ] Added/updated file docs in `docs/files/` (mirror repo path exact)
- [ ] Updated `docs/INDEX.md` with new workflows or entrypoints
- [ ] Set `last_reviewed` to today's date in updated docs
- [ ] Provided rationale in PR body if a new repo file deliberately has no file doc

> If you're not touching workflows, entrypoints, data IO, or config, this checklist is optional.

## Notes for reviewer

Any special review instructions.
